snippet: STUCKY--Steven. The Board of Directors and staff of New Music U.S.A. note with great sadness the death of our Vice Chairman, Steven Stucky. Steve was a brilliant composer and a renowned teacher. His wisdom, humor, erudition and humility made him the best colleague imaginable. He will be sorely missed. Frederick Peters, Chairman, Board of Directors Ed Harsh, President and Chief Executive Officer 1/3
lead_paragraph: STUCKY--Steven. The Board of Directors and staff of New Music U.S.A. note with great sadness the death of our Vice Chairman, Steven Stucky. Steve was a brilliant composer and a renowned teacher. His wisdom, humor, erudition and humility made him the best colleague imaginable. He will be sorely missed. Frederick Peters, Chairman, Board of Directors Ed Harsh, President and Chief Executive Officer 1/3
